casebody.data:
Jonathan E. BRUNSON, Plaintiff,
v.
OFFICE OF THE DISTRICT ATTORNEY FOR THE 12TH PROSECUTORIAL DISTRICT, the Office of the Cumberland County Sheriff, North Carolina Department of Social Services, Office of the 12th Judiciary, North Carolina Department of Public Safety, North Carolina Department of Justice, North Carolina Department of Human Resources, and The State of North Carolina, Defendants. No. COA18-572 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: December 18, 2018

DISMISSED.
